tagline: Java based configuration Spring MVC Exapmles
body:
### Here you can find SPRING MVC Examples.
JAVA Based configuration SPRING MVC Example:

1)Download the code from master branch.

2)Import it into Eclipse.

3)Start the tomcat server and run the Example by entering the URL `http://localhost:{port}/HelloSpring` in browser.

### Contact
subalchaudhari@gmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Springmvcexamples
